common.adjustParams: Adjust parameters to see your potential savings.
common.fteDescription: This saving equals the annual salary of {{count}} FTE employee(s) dedicated exclusively to administrative tasks that ProcureData automates.

aria.operationalDesc: With {{suppliers}} suppliers homologated via ProcureData, your team saves {{savings}} EUROe annually in direct administrative costs.
aria.liberatedDesc: Equals {{ftes}} full-time employees who can focus on strategic negotiation and Tier-1 supplier development.
aria.competitiveDesc: Reducing onboarding from 22 days to 24 hours positions you as a preferred customer for critical component suppliers.
aria.premiumNetwork: With more than 5 FTEs liberated, you qualify for the Premium Supplier Network with priority access to new verified suppliers.

aria.brandValueDesc: With a purity index of {{purity}}%, your oil obtains a +{{premium}}% premium, generating {{equity}}€ additional annual brand value.
aria.antiFraudDesc: GPS registration of each olive on blockchain provides {{level}} protection against fraud by mixing with lower quality oils.
aria.premiumMarketDesc: A collection radius of {{radius}} km positions you in the {{segment}} segment of the extra virgin olive oil market.
aria.doCertifiedDesc: Your cooperative meets the requirements for the Blockchain Protected Origin seal, accessing international gourmet distributors.

aria.environmentalDesc: Your fleet of {{fleet}} vehicles with {{ratio}}% electric avoids {{emissions}} tons of CO₂ annually compared to a 100% diesel fleet.
aria.financialAdvantageDesc: This emission reduction translates to {{savings}}K€ annual savings in access to green loans with reduced rates.
aria.csrdScoreDesc: Your score of {{score}}/100 in the sustainable mobility indicator positions you as {{position}}.
aria.greenLoanDesc: Your fleet qualifies for a -{{reduction}}% interest rate reduction with the European Green Finance Bank.

aria.capitalDesc: Digital pre-validation of {{efficiency}}% of your documents liberates {{capital}} € that was previously blocked in in-transit inventory.
aria.timeReductionDesc: Dispatch is reduced from {{traditional}}h to {{pd}}h, freeing {{saved}} hours per operation for route optimization.
aria.digitalDocDesc: {{docs}} digital documents have been processed with valid electronic signature for the Tax Agency and Customs.
aria.aeoCertifiedDesc: Your digital efficiency level positions you to obtain AEO (Authorized Economic Operator) certification, reducing physical inspections by 80%.
aria.volumeDiscountDesc: With {{teu}} monthly TEUs, you access the Port BCN Premium program with an additional 12% discount on port fees.

aria.multipliedDesc: Your investment generates an impact of 1:{{multiplier}}. For every euro spent, you return {{multiplier}} € to society in the form of inclusive employment.
aria.publicSavingDesc: Each person inserted into the labor market saves {{saving}} € in subsidies and public aid, freeing resources for other social programs.
aria.tenderAdvantageDesc: Your blockchain SROI certification increases awards by +{{increase}}%, as many administrations prioritize suppliers with verified social impact.
aria.specialEmploymentDesc: With an insertion rate of {{rate}}%, you meet the requirements for Special Employment Center qualification, accessing additional tax benefits.
aria.communityImpactDesc: You have generated {{jobs}} inclusive jobs. This level of impact positions you as a reference company in social and solidarity economy.

aria.arbitrationDesc: The smart contract acts as an impartial arbitrator between carrier and pharmaceutical. If temperature exceeds limits, payment is automatically blocked. Zero disputes and insurance premiums reduced by {{reduction}}%.
aria.thermalDesc: IoT sensors detect temperature excursions in real-time. With {{compliance}}% compliance, your product loss rate drops to near zero.
aria.gdpDesc: Automatic GDP audit trail with blockchain evidence accepted by EMA and FDA.

aria.predictiveDesc: The predictive model detected a thermal anomaly in MRI {{unit}} on Tuesday. Wednesday the technician arrived with the spare part. Thursday the equipment would have failed. We avoided {{saving}}€ in production losses.
aria.privacyDesc: Thanks to the IDS connector, the hospital shared technical logs without exposing any patient personal data. Edge functions anonymize DICOM metadata before transmission.
aria.uptimeDesc: With {{uptime}}% availability, surgical schedules are never compromised by unexpected equipment failures.

retailEthics.title: SA8000 Ethics Audit Dashboard
retailEthics.ariaInsight: Blockchain traceability on Pontus-X guarantees that each SA8000 certificate has not been tampered with since its issuance at origin. ODRL policies allow only the ethics committee to access detailed reports, protecting the supplier's competitive privacy while ensuring full compliance.

compliance.reputationalRiskDesc: Continuous verification eliminates surprises in audits

aria.gridIndependenceDesc: You have reduced grid dependency by {{independence}}%. Your average bill has dropped {{savings}}€ per company thanks to the P2P marketplace.
aria.activeCommunityDesc: {{companies}} companies participate in P2P energy exchange, creating a resilient local ecosystem.
aria.energyIslandDesc: Your community can operate autonomously during grid outages.

aria.name: ARIA
aria.instantDesc: With wind at {{windSpeed}} m/s and PPA price of {{price}}€/MWh, your instant settlement generates {{payout}} EUROe in the current block.
aria.waitDesc: Traditional payment takes {{traditional}} days. With Smart Contract, you receive payment in {{blockchain}} seconds, releasing capital instantly.
aria.projectionDesc: Estimated generation: {{generation}} GWh/year with revenues of {{revenue}} M€.
aria.optimalWindDesc: Current speed is in the optimal range of the power curve. Capacity factor exceeds 35%, maximizing PPA profitability.
aria.ppaPremiumDesc: Your PPA price of {{price}}€/MWh is above market. Blockchain certification guarantees renewable origin traceability, justifying the premium.

aria.name: ARIA
aria.certifHyIssued: By exceeding 95% renewable mix, I have issued the Digital Hydrogen Passport, unlocking {{amount}}€ in European funds.
aria.certifHyPending: Increase the renewable mix to 95% to obtain full CertifHy certification.
aria.climateDesc: Your green H2 production avoids {{tons}} tonCO2 annually.
aria.eligibleProjects: Eligible for IPCEI projects and NextGenerationEU funds.

aria.name: ARIA
aria.recoveryDesc: By reducing dirt to {{days}} days, you recover {{mwh}} MWh daily, generating {{revenue}}€ additional.
aria.annualDesc: With {{panels}} optimized panels, your annual production reaches {{mwh}} MWh, enough to power {{homes}} homes.
aria.alertDesc: Accumulated dirt is causing an efficiency loss of {{loss}}%. I recommend scheduling immediate cleaning.
aria.optimalDesc: Your solar field operates under optimal conditions. Predictive IoT maintains maximum efficiency.

aria.name: ARIA
aria.monetizationDesc: By notarizing your reduction of {{kw}} kW on Pontus-X, you have earned {{earnings}} EUROe in flexibility incentives this month.
aria.impactDesc: Your load reduction avoids {{co2}} tonCO2 monthly, equivalent to planting {{trees}} trees.
aria.projectionDesc: Maintaining this flexibility capacity, you will generate {{annual}} EUROe annually in incentives.
aria.premiumDesc: Your reliability level of {{reliability}}% qualifies you as a premium aggregator.
aria.largeConsumerDesc: With {{mw}} MW capacity, you can participate directly in the balancing market.

aria.name: ARIA
aria.traceabilityNeutral: Origin is 100% legal. Blockchain traceability has certified your biomass as Carbon Neutral, raising your sale price by 12%.
aria.traceabilityPending: Reduce transport distance to under 100km to obtain Carbon Neutral certification.
aria.climateDesc: Your biomass avoids {{tons}} tonCO2 annually vs fossil fuels.
aria.verifiedDesc: Geolocated cutting points verified against official forestry records.

aria.name: ARIA
aria.auditDesc: I have audited your {{suppliers}} steel suppliers. Your CSRD Scope 3 report has a precision of {{precision}}%.
aria.circularDesc: With {{ratio}}% recycled steel, you reduce emissions by {{reduction}} tonCO2.
aria.csrdReadyDesc: Your report is valid for international tenders and meets the requirements of the European CSRD directive.
